Posts.Content: May 23, 2019 06:01PM Newfromny wrote: I did TCHP so I had taxotere, hair is growing back slowly so I’m not sure what it will look like yet, but more importantly I had a complete response, my large tumor was completely gone and lymph nodes were also cancer free. Choose what you feel is best for you
